title: Types Of Covid-19 Treatment
content:
Accessing Treatment
Visit
Treatment Locator (hhs.gov)
or call 1-800-232-0233 (TTY 1-888-720-7489) to find a location that offers testing and treatment or a pharmacy where you can fill your prescription.
Did you know?
COVID-19 oral antiviral treatments Paxlovid and Lagevrio are available for certain people at a lower cost.
Patient assistance programs
